item.title: Siti Networks Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure Despite Weak Fundamentals
item.description: Siti Networks Ltd (BZ series) surged to hit its upper circuit price limit on 5 February 2026, reflecting intense buying interest despite a subdued market backdrop. The stock closed at ₹0.35, marking a maximum daily gain within its permitted price band, as investors responded to persistent demand and limited supply, triggering a regulatory freeze on further trades. Time: 14 minutes ago

item.title: Tijaria Polypipes Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Robust Buying Pressure

Time: 14 minutes ago

item.title: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd Sees Heavy Trading Amid Bearish Momentum
